content: this pattern includes separate graphs showing each animal individually and an excel file with the patterns please feel free to mix and match as you please my goal in creating this pattern was to make the individual shapes available for free use without the constraint of a single pattern so don t hesitate to use one of the shapes on its own if you want the google drive link is to an excel file for you to use to access the numbered version of the chart as well as the excel version of each pattern
